name: [Lembus] ability
uniques: [This Unit] gains [1] movement <upon discovering a [Rare feature] tile>

name: [Jatha] ability

Gain [10] [Science] <upon ending a turn in a [City center] tile>  <(modified by game speed)> <hidden from users>
Gain [10] [Faith] <upon ending a turn in a [City center] tile>  <(modified by game speed)> <hidden from users>
Gain [10] [Gold] <upon ending a turn in a [City center] tile>  <(modified by game speed)> <hidden from users>
